Blog.Author: Author
Blog.Title: Netra: Speak Without Fear
Blog.Text: At a time when the importance of online privacy continues to grow, Netra is a unique solution. Our app is designed to provide users with a platform where they can share content freely and securely, without the fear of their identity being exposed. Netra's core principle is complete anonymity, ensuring that users' personal information is never compromised. The app gives users the ability to post content while keeping their identity hidden, with only the developer having the power to manage or delete posts.

Blog.Title: Rishabh Kumar - Google CSE
Blog.Text: I'm RISHABH SAHIL. I am a Full Stack Developer from India with over 3 years of experience in software engineering. My journey in this field has led me to contribute to several impactful open-source projects.
